abstract: Citibank, Bank of America and JPMorgan Chase missed goals that aimed to eliminate mistakes, misinformation and lengthy delays from the process of granting loan modifications.
snippet: Citibank, Bank of America and JPMorgan Chase missed goals that aimed to eliminate mistakes, misinformation and lengthy delays from the process of granting loan modifications.
lead_paragraph: Three of the nation’s largest mortgage lenders are still failing to comply with key requirements of a national settlement over mortgage abuses, according to a new report that suggests that some borrowers are still trapped in a tangle of red tape and errors as they try to save their homes from foreclosure.

headline.main: Banks Fail to Comply With Parts of Mortgage Settlement, Report Says
headline.print_headline: Banks Fail to Comply With Parts of Mortgage Settlement, Report Says
